name: Curry & Culc - Make weird curries while doing math
name_original: Curry & Culc - Make weird curries while doing math
description:
This is a brain training program for children and adults.

 It can be enjoyed by everyone from children to the elderly, as long as you can do the calculations required for elementary school.
 However, there is more than one way to answer the questions because you have to choose the numbers to match the questions and construct the equation.

The game has a gameplay that will keep you entertained.
 The numbers that appear on the field are random, and the same numbers do not appear in succession.
 In addition, the numbers disappear after a certain amount of time.
 It requires not only calculation skills but also quick judgment and strategy.
 Also, at first, the game only requires the addition of three numbers, but if you can clear the numbers in a certain amount of time, you will be able to challenge the next difficult level.

Easy and fun for children.
 The required operations are simple, so even elementary school children can play.
 The explanations and dialogues are as simple as possible.
 It's not just a game app, so it's a great way to take a break from learning at home.

It's all free!
 This is a free app. There are no in-app purchases, so you can enjoy it without worry.
 This version also has no ads.
